name: ModalLogic IT Systems
tag_list: product-development-company, custom-software, learning-management-system, lms, elearning-software, software-quality-assurance, msas-lms, meterplus
overview:
ModalLogic it Systems Pvt. Ltd. India is an offshore development company specialized in customized software development, outsourcing and IT services.

Located in Pune (the education and IT capital of India), we provide custom high end IT solutions & services for our clients from various domains. We have many years of experience in design, development & integration of commercial & scientific applications.

Our Services are characterized as:

1] Custom Application Software Development 2] Reengineering of Legacy Systems 3] Business Process Management Software Solutions 4] Portal and Content Management Solutions 5] Learning Management System Services. 6] Financial Accounting Software Solutions 7] E-commerce Integration Services 8] IT Consulting Services 9] Quality Assurance Services

Our Products

1] MeterPlus - Software Performance Analysis Tool. 2] MSAS LMS - Enterprise Learning Management System.

Benefits

Business & domain expertise A favorable development environment Design, development and documentation using best practices Knowledge transfer, training to your support and technical teams Level 2 support for production environments Quality and Compliance guaranteed by our QA specialists
